title: What are the best hotels in Miami under $100 and clean
excerpt: Finding clean and affordable hotels in Miami can be quite a challenge, especially with the city's popularity drawing in tourists from all over the world. This curated list highlights budget-friendly options that do not compromise on cleanliness or comfort, ensuring you enjoy your stay without breaking the bank. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, these selections will help you make the most of your Miami experience.
intro: Discover the best budget-friendly hotels in Miami that offer both cleanliness and comfort, all for under $100.
